sentences.english: You have only a superficial knowledge of the subject.
sentences.chinese: 你对该学科只有粗浅的了解。

sentences.english: Wasn’t fake or shallow with comments to students
sentences.chinese: 对学生的评论不虚假，不粗浅。

sentences.english: Even what you learn during the four years of university will be sth quite superficial too.
sentences.chinese: 就是大学四年，所授课业也还是相当粗浅的学识。

sentences.english: This paper is divided into five chapters to put forward suggestions on sexual harassment.
sentences.chinese: 本文共分为五章来对性骚扰问题进行粗浅的分析。

sentences.english: This article attempts to make some shallow discussions in this aspect.
sentences.chinese: 本文试图从这方面作一些粗浅的探讨。

sentences.english: This article try to make this superficial discussion.
sentences.chinese: 本文试对此作粗浅的探讨。

sentences.english: Several items of main clews for the teaching of steel structure is presented in the paper .
sentences.chinese: 以下谈谈十几年来对钢结构课程教学的一些粗浅体会。

sentences.english: When all the other flowers bloom, She just smile among them.
sentences.chinese: 括号里的可以省略，还是很粗浅，见笑。

sentences.english: This article on vocal music teaching in esthetic question test shallow exploration.
sentences.chinese: 本文就声乐教学中的审美化问题试作粗浅探索。

sentences.english: The feature of the shear slide zone of the Wudu area are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 就武都地区滑坡的剪切滑动带特征作一粗浅探讨。

definition: slight knowledge of sth/superficial acquaintance with a subject/a smattering
lit. to know one and understand half (idiom); a smattering of knowledge/dilettante/amateur
to know that it is so but not why it is so (idiom)
pinyin: zhi1 qi2 ran2 er2 bu4 zhi1 qi2 suo3 yi3 ran2
related.word: 知其然而不知其所以然

definition: lit. one scale and half a claw (idiom); only odd bits and pieces
lit. throw out a brick and get jade thrown back (idiom)/fig. to attract others' interest or suggestions by putting forward one's own modest ideas to get the ball rolling
dissenting religious sect (idiom); heretical school of opinion/dissident group
